#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int day,year,t,leap,total,r; cin>>t;char month[4],b[5],c[5],str[50];
	for(r=1;r<=t;r++)
	{
		cin>>str;   day=(str[0]-'0')*10+(str[1]-'0'); //cout<<"date : "<<day<<endl;
		month[0]=str[3] ;month[1]=str[4];month[2]=str[5]; 
		//cout<<"month : "<<month<<endl;
		year=(str[7]-'0')*1000+(str[8]-'0')*100+(str[9]-'0')*10+(str[10]-'0');
		//cout<<"year : "<<year<<endl;  
		if(year%400 ==0) leap=29;
		else if(year%4==0 && year%100!=0)  leap=29;
		else  leap=28;
		
		switch(month[2])
		{
		/*JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, OCT, NOV, DEC*/
			case 'N' : if(month[1]=='A') {total=0;} 
				else {total=31+30+31+leap+31; }  break;
			case 'B': total=31;break;
			case 'R': if(month[0]=='M'){ total=leap+31;}
				  else{ total=31+leap+31;}break;
			case 'Y' : total=30+31+leap+31;break;
			case 'L' :total=30+31+30+31+leap+31; break;
			case 'G' : total=31+30+31+30+31+leap+31;break;
			case 'P' : total=31+31+30+31+30+31+leap+31; break;
			case 'T':total=30+31+31+30+31+30+31+leap+31; break;
			case 'V': total=31+30+31+31+30+31+30+31+leap+31;break;
			case 'C':total=30+31+30+31+31+30+31+30+31+leap+31;break;
		}
		//cout<<"TOTAL :  "<<total<<endl;
		total=total+day;//cout<<"TOTAL :  "<<total<<endl;
		if(total<=300) cout<<"Case "<<r<<": "<<total<<" "<<"Hundreds"<<endl;
		else if(total>300 &&  total<=360)
		{
			total=total-300; cout<<"Case "<<r<<": "<<total<<" "<<"Tens"<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			total=total-360;cout<<"Case "<<r<<": "<<total<<" "<<"Ones"<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
